document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/H21/IDC Prodoc 2012-2013 situation analysis and strategy Latest.doc

outputs.output_descr: Increased capacity for assessing policy options for inclusive development (employment creating growth, social protection and MDG-consistent service delivery)  in light of long term trends and emerging threats such as macroeconomic volatility, rising inequality, social unrest and environmental vulnerability,  through country studies, knowledge products and policy advisory services.

project_descr: Policies and strategies for inclusive development.
